patents: [{"title":"LEAK-PROOF ECO-FRIENDLY TAKEAWAY CONTAINER","patents_id":"US 62912065","description":"Invented a design to make food boxes/container from cardboard sheet with water proof lining such that box can store all types of food including liquids without leakage. Designed container is made without adhesive or staples, fold interlockings included in designs take care of that. Truss like structure in design gives it strength as comparable to rigid plastic boxes. Afterall, it is easy to use and make from cardboard sheet with crease pattern marked into it."}]
projects: [{"title":"Krishi Sevak- Credit Allocation based on Farm Assessment ","description":"This project was the prototype created during the Massachusetts Institute Of Technology India Initiative at Welingkar Institute of Managment Studies,Mumbai. The theme of the project being- Fintech for Social Good.This project is based on credit allocation based on farm assessment. The proposition is brought for the betterment of the farmers who have a good farm production but somehow don't receive the credit from investors. The value added feature this project has to offer is the 'Farm Score' which every farmer will earn and which can be used to avail credit loans from the investors purely based on their individual farming capability."}]
